post.description: Create an instance of 'Industries' with the given payload of type 'Industry' in JSON format.

patch.description: Update an instance of 'Industries' with the given payload of type 'Industry' in JSON format and with the specified id.

get.description: Retrieve all or some selected properties from an instance of 'Industries' with the given id.

delete.description: Delete an instance of 'Industries' with the specified id.

tags.name: Industries
tags.description: This entity enables you to manipulate 'Industries'. It represents the industries list from which an industry can be associated with a sales opportunity.
